alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:10AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Nebraska and northeast Nebraska, including the following counties, in east central Nebraska, Butler. In northeast Nebraska, Colfax. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 908 AM CST, emergency management reported an ice jam near Schuyler, 2 miles downstream of the HWY 15 bridge. Flooding is already occurring on the north bank. - Flooding is occurring along the Platte River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Butler and Southeastern Colfax Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
